control_attributes.Control: AU-6 (8) FULL TEXT ANALYSIS OF PRIVILEGED COMMANDS
control_attributes.control_description: The organization performs a full text analysis of audited privileged commands in a physically distinct component or subsystem of the information system, or other information system that is dedicated to that analysis.

Control Statement: The organization performs a full text analysis of audited privileged commands in a physically distinct component or subsystem of the information system, or other information system that is dedicated to that analysis.
Control Name: AU-6 (8) FULL TEXT ANALYSIS OF PRIVILEGED COMMANDS
